title: Add Bhatoa Traders branding images (logo + hero banner)

requirements.text: Generate and add the Bhatoa Traders branding image assets to the frontend as static files under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames and dimensions specified in the project image requirements.
acceptanceCriteria: The following files exist in the deployed build at the exact paths and are served without 404s: /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-logo.dim_512x512.png and /assets/generated/bhatoa-traders-hero.dim_1600x600.png
The logo image is 512x512 and the hero banner image is 1600x600
Both images render correctly in the existing UI locations (header/footer logo and hero section banner) without layout breakage on mobile and desktop

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI components are read-only).

Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
nonGoals: Adding new site sections or changing existing business copy beyond what is necessary to display the branding images
Implementing authentication or any backend data storage
Integrating third-party image hosting or fetching images via the backend

required: Simple modern wordmark logo reading “Bhatoa Traders”, clean vector-like look, minimal icon hinting at school supplies/commerce (bhatoa-traders-logo.dim_512x512.png) 512x512
Wide hero banner illustration with abstract school-supply motifs (notebooks, pens, furniture silhouettes) in a professional warm palette (bhatoa-traders-hero.dim_1600x600.png) 1600x600
